Products.name: Potato
Products.description: In Italy, potatoes are stars in dishes, From creamy gnocchi to crispy pizza wishes.Since the 16th century, they've played their part, In rustic kitchens and haute cuisine's art.

Products.name: Cucamber
Products.description: In Italy, cucumbers lend their crisp bite,      To salads, plates, a refreshing delight.From ancient times, they've graced Italian fare, Adding coolness to dishes with flair.

Products.name: Tomato
Products.description: In Italy, tomatoes shine bright and red,In sauces, salads, atop pizzas spread.From centuries past to modern days,They're staples in Italy's flavorful maze.
